BackstoryDef.title: Drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Drone "childhoods" are as uninteresting as they are often forgotten. Many creators don't bother marking the moment of awakening, and no drone knows its own history.

BackstoryDef.title: Drone
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} is a drone that continues to serve based on {PAWN_possessive} programming. There's no way of knowing how many times that programming has changed, but the drone does not seem bothered by this.
